titles.title: Awake, Awake, Put On Thy Strength

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Awake, awake, put on thy strength.
Put on thy strength, Oh Zion.
Put on thy beautiful garments, Oh Jerusalem.
Thou art the holy city of thy God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Arise and shine for thy light is come.
The glory of the Lord is risen upon thee.
And though thy sins were as scarlet,
Now, they be as white as snow.
Thou art the holy city of thy God.
